'''Aidan Turner''' ([[19 June|June 19]], [[1983]]) is an Irish actor. He portrayed [[Kíli]] in ''[[The Hobbit (film series)]]''.

When his participation was announced, some confusion arose whether the actor cast was Aidan Turner, star of ''[[wikipedia:Being Human (TV Series)|Being Human]]'', or [[wikipedia:Aiden Turner|Aiden Turner]], star of ''[[wikipedia:All My Children|All My Children]]'', as an article on Deadline.com that was amongst the first to announce the cast used both spellings in its report.<ref>Deadline.com, ''[http://www.deadline.com/2010/10/peter-jackson-sets-first-names-for-the-hobbit/ Peter Jackson sets first names for ''The Hobbit'']'', accessed [[29 October|October 29]], [[2010]])</ref>

==Awards==
* [[2014]] - '''[http://www.empireonline.com/ Empire Award]''', Best Male Newcomer, ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''
